fr.umlv.escape.bonus

Class BonusFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.bonus.BonusFactory

  • public class BonusFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class supplies methods to create properly a Bonus.

    • Method Detail

      • createBonus

        public Bonus createBonus(java.lang.String bonusName,
                int posX,
                int posY,
                int type)
        Create a Bonus.
        Parameters:
        bonusName - The name of the bonus to create.
        posX - The x position of the bonus to create.
        posY - The y position of the bonus to create.
        type - The type of the bonus to create. Each Bonus can have their owns types.
        Returns:
        the bonus created.

        Get the unique instance of BonusFactory.

        The unique instance of BonusFactory
